summary.title: Engineering Director
summary.bio: I am a person motivated by challenging goals and being fully accountable for results. Always fascinated how business and technology meet together. Background in software development and a good understanding of business aspects allows me in better alignment of IT solutions with the company's vision and strategy. I believe that people are the key asset in  IT industry and growing engaged, skilled, empowered teams is the best investment of the organization.
